page.title: 01Environment
page.content: The area and environment which our study covers for the{Domesday Project} is mainly a farming area with two small villages in it and a scattering of farms. There is a busy road,the { {A19,}which passes through it from North to South. A deep dene or ghyll,which is wooded,crosses from the North-West corner to the South-East corner of our twelve square kilometres. The land is about two to three hundred feet above sea level and over-looks{Hartlepool}and{Teesside } which is a few miles away. People who live here,apart from the farmers, almost all work outside our area. The area was first settled by the Saxons and{Elwick}and{Dalton Piercy}are Saxon names of the two villages in the area.People regard the Villages as attractive places both to live in and to visit.
